summary: Academic professional with broad exposure within many contexts, cultures, leadership, and innovation systems. Global experience in technologies, social ecosystems, politics, and culture. Personal strengths include analytical solid and holistic conceptualization skills, linked with results focus and hands-on action, sustained through action research and collaboration. Developed solid interpersonal skills and broad networking experience. Lived in urban and rural areas in Belgium, Eswatini, India, the Netherlands, Zambia, and Zimbabwe.
